settings.title:
SUBMIT YOUR ORDER FOR A CHANCE TO
RECEIVE AN INSTANT REBATE

settings.code:
Rebate applies to qualifying purchases after purchase date 7/11/2022 

Consumers will have 6 weeks after their purchase date to submit their rebate claim. No late submissions will be accepted. Consumers should receive their rebate within 4 weeks after Rustic Kitchen and Bath receives the submission. Only retail purchases by an end-user in the United States purchased on Rustic Kitchen and Bath will be eligible. Multiple orders with one large appliance on each does not qualify. Only one order number with more than one qualifying appliance that meets the dollar requirements below will be considered for qualification. Rustic Kitchen and Bath reserves the right to request additional information regarding the submission. Rustic Kitchen and Bath reserves the right to modify the program rules or cancel the program at any time without prior notification or warning. In the event of program termination, Program participants will have 30 days from the Program termination date in which to submit final reward claims. Not all brands qualify for rebates. Please call for more information.

Qualifying Appliances:

  • Ranges
  • Cooktops
  • Refrigerators
  • Range Hoods
  • Wall Ovens
  • Microwaves
  • Dishwashers

 

Rebate Program:

  • Receive a $100 store gift certificate when you spend $2,500-$3,999.
  • Receive a $200 store gift certificate when you spend $4,000-$5,499.
  • Receive a $300 store gift certificate when you spend $5,500-$6,999.
  • Receive a $400 store gift certificate when you spend $7,000-$8,499.
  • Receive a $500 store gift certificate when you spend $8,500-$9,999.
  • Receive a $600 store gift certificate when you spend $10,000 or more.
